text: His Ward's Love is a 1909 American silent movie directed by D. W. GriffithHis Ward’s LoveHis Ward’s Love and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Lawrence, and Owen Moore. ==Actors== * Arthur V. Johnson as Reverend Howson * Florence Lawrence as The Reverend's Ward * Owen Moore as General Winthrop * Linda Arvidson as The Maid ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: His Ward's Love
